Maritime Bulletin Daily Nov 03 – 04
04 Nov 2019, 06:21 by Mikhail Voytenko
Accidents• Cargo ship sank in Gulf of Tonkin, crew rescued• Freighter attacked in Gulf of Guinea, 9 crew kidnapped UPDATE• Aground and Not Under Command vessels Worldwide Alerts (2 ships)
Details only for subscribers.Annual subscription $750. For annual subscription, contact vmd@odin.tcSubscribe if you want to receive accidents news ASAP and in full.
